#J-18808-Ljbffr

title: Growth Marketing Associate (Japanese Speaker)
description:
Job Overview:

As a Growth Marketing Associate, your primary focus will be on user acquisition, conversion, and onboarding. This role requires a dynamic and data-driven individual with a deep understanding of luxury markets and a proven track record in digital marketing and acquisition campaigns.

Responsibilities:

  1. Community Growth and Strategy Development:
    • Develop and implement community lead generation strategies to support qualitative, targeted, and sustainable growth.
    • Develop and maintain a marketing calendar in your dedicated region to plan and execute lead-generation activities, including social media campaigns, ads, partnerships, outreach programs, and direct recruitment.
    • Stay up to date on the latest marketing trends and best practices.
  2. Lead Generation Campaign Development and Execution:
    • Lead the development and execution of lead generation campaigns across all channels, including online, offline, and social media.
    • Collaborate with cross-functional teams in market and at a global level to ensure that campaigns are aligned with business objectives, brand identity, and compliance.
    • Develop and implement campaign tracking dashboards and reporting strategies to measure campaign performance.
    • Implement direct recruitment campaigns to identify and onboard evaluators, ensuring fully qualified evaluators join the community team.
    • Monitor and manage campaigns across various platforms to maximize user acquisition while maintaining cost-effectiveness.
  3. Data Management and Analysis:
    • Collect, manage, and analyze marketing data from various sources (HubSpot, Meta, and our internal database) to continuously optimize campaigns.
    • Implement A/B testing and data-driven optimization strategies to enhance the effectiveness of user acquisition efforts.
    • Provide regular reports on the performance of paid advertising efforts and direct recruitment initiatives.
  4. Growth Mindset:
    • Identify new growth opportunities to expand our reach and grow our community.
    • Build and maintain relationships with key influencers in our industry.
    • Explore locally relevant channels, both online and offline.
    • Test and experiment with new tactics to drive innovation.
  5. Communication and Teamwork:
    • Work closely with the Operations team to streamline the onboarding process for recruited evaluators to ensure a smooth transition to mission assignment.
    • Develop and execute targeted communication strategies to engage potential evaluators and display the unique opportunities within the luxury evaluation community.
    • Write clear and concise marketing materials in English (other languages are a plus).
    • Manage multiple projects and deadlines simultaneously.
    • Ability to work independently and take ownership of projects.
    • Demonstrate initiative and a proactive approach to problem-solving.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or a related field; master's degree is a plus.
  • 5 years of experience in lead generation, content creation, and social media marketing.
  • Proven experience in planning and executing successful paid advertising campaigns.
  • Strong understanding of direct recruitment strategies and tactics.
  • Knowledge of the luxury industry and its key players.
  • Excellent analytical skills and proficiency in data analysis tools.
  • Effective communication and relationship-building skills.
  • Experience working with CRM Marketing tools (HubSpot), design tools (Canva), and AI tools (Midjourney, ChatGPT, Bard).
  • Bilingual in English and Japanese.
#J-18808-Ljbffr

title: WM | Wealth Management Analyst (Daily Banker)
description:
Por que trabalhar no BTG?

Que tal ter a chance de ser dono do seu próprio negócio dentro de uma empresa sólida e com mais de 30 anos de história? No BTG valorizamos espírito empreendedor, autonomia, agilidade, foco no cliente, excelência e visão de longo prazo. Agimos com integridade, responsabilidade, simplicidade, inconformismo e dedicação. Meritocracia está no centro do nosso dia a dia. Temos um escritório open space e uma estrutura horizontal onde você vai conversar com os melhores profissionais de mercado e ter desafios reais e diários.

Sobre a área:

Referência no mercado Latino Americano, a área de Wealth Management do BTG Pactual conta com uma das mais competentes e premiadas equipe em serviços de gestão patrimonial. Avaliamos detalhadamente as demandas e necessidades individuais de cada cliente e elaboramos soluções financeiras específicas, sempre alinhadas com as regras e parâmetros regulatórios de cada país. A área de Wealth Management tem como principal responsabilidade originar e administrar o relacionamento com clientes de alto patrimônio renda (UHNW), oferecendo a eles conhecimento estratégico na alocação dos seus recursos e proteção do seu capital. Além disso, busca sempre desenvolver e manter relacionamentos de longo prazo, oferecendo desta forma o melhor aconselhamento nos diferentes momentos de vida do cliente.

No seu dia a dia:

  1. Controlar operações e posições de clientes, executar e boletar ordens de clientes nos diferentes mercados, onshore e offshore;
  2. Relacionamento direto com clientes sofisticados;
  3. Otimizar processos e controles internos;
  4. Ofertar produtos aos clientes;
  5. Interface com outras áreas do Banco (Middle, Onboarding, Jurídico, Câmbio, Compliance dentre outras).

Esperamos de você:

  • Formação completa, preferencialmente em Administração, Economia e/ou Engenharia;
  • Bons conhecimentos de mercado financeiro onshore e offshore;
  • CPA 20 (ANBIMA) - Desejável CFP;
  • Capacidade de concentração e de atendimento a múltiplas demandas;
  • Fluência verbal e escrita em inglês.

Benefícios:

  • Salário CLT.
  • PLR Própria.
  • PLR Bancária.
  • Vale Alimentação e Vale Refeição.
  • Seguro Saúde e Odontológico.
  • Auxílio Creche.
  • Vale Transporte.
  • Gympass.
  • Planos por adesão como Previdência Privada e Seguro de Vida.
  • Programa de Apoio Pessoal.

O BTG Pactual respeita a pluralidade de identidades e trabalha para promover uma cultura inclusiva. Não fazemos distinção de raça, cor, religião, identidade de gênero, orientação sexual, nacionalidade, deficiência ou idade em nenhuma etapa do processo seletivo, reforçando nosso compromisso com a diversidade.

#J-18808-Ljbffr

title: PPC Marketing Manager
description:
E-trink is seeking a talented individual who possesses infinite curiosity. We are building a global eCommerce powerhouse by prioritizing operational efficiency through the use of accurate scaling and technology. Our vision is becoming a global! This is an incredible opportunity to make a meaningful impact on the future of E-trink.

What we're looking for

As PPC Marketing Manager you will be responsible for the strategic and operational management of multiple brands and markets within the Amazon ad console and third-party tools.

Responsibilities

Autonomous Brand and Market Management:

  • Create and Optimize PPC campaigns for multiple brands and markets (US & EU) in close collaboration with the brand managers.
  • Develop and implement strategies to maximize traffic, efficiency, and sales on Amazon.

Campaign Management and Bidding Optimization:

  • Proficiently handle various Amazon campaign types.
  • Utilize third-party bidding and structuring tools to optimize campaigns at scale.

Knowledge and Industry Awareness:

  • Keep up-to-date with the latest trends, features, and changes within Amazon PPC and the broader e-commerce landscape.
  • Apply industry insights to test innovative and effective PPC strategies.

Reporting and KPIs:

  • Comfortably navigate and interpret complex performance reports.
  • Set, monitor, and achieve KPI's such as TACOS, ACOS, and revenue targets.

Proactive Communication:

  • Maintain proactive communication with internal teams and stakeholders.
  • Provide regular updates on campaign performance, challenges, and proposed solutions.

Problem Solving:

  • Demonstrate strong problem-solving skills to address issues promptly and effectively.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to resolve challenges and optimize campaigns.

Qualifications

  • 1-2 years of hands-on experience managing Amazon PPC campaigns.
  • In-depth knowledge of Amazon PPC tools, features, and campaign structures.
  • Experience with third-party bidding and structuring tools.
  • Strong analytical and reporting skills, with a focus on data-driven decision-making.
  • Proactive communication and collaboration skills.
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
  • Results-oriented mindset with a track record of achieving and exceeding KPIs.

Benefits

  • A competitive salary package.
  • Meal card support.
  • Annual company retreat.
  • Your performance will not be evaluated based on your working hours but your delivery.
  • Your birthday will be your OFF day.

How to Apply

Does this position sound like a good fit? Email us at

Include this role's title in your subject line (it'll help us to sort through the emails).

Send along links that best showcase the relevant things you've built and done.

Hiring Policy: Applicants will be evaluated, and HR will get in contact with the fitting candidates for further steps.
